roleset.name: send (a statement)
roleset.note: CONVEY-V NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls say-37.7-1, send-11.1. (from convey.01-v)

roles.note: I love how the two senses come together in the framing here. (from convey.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: While U.S. officials voice optimism about Japan's enlarged role in Asia, they also convey an undertone of caution.
example.arg: While U.S. officials voice optimism about Japan's enlarged role in Asia

example.name: with recipient
example.text: He says that the Chinese never asked him-1 *trace*-1 to convey their statements to President Bush, but that the White House spontaneously invited him to do so.
